DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study assess feasibility use treadmill desk ( Workstations ) within Louisiana office workplace determine effect walk work overweight obese , sedentary individual .
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible participant randomize chance WorkStation Intervention Group Usual Working Condition Group . The WorkStation Intervention Group ask walk 1.5 hour per day work week Monday Friday treadmill . Participants complete two session per day 45 minute per session , track time speed . Usual Working Condition Group ask continue work usual environment accustom manner . Regardless group participant assign , participant ask complete baseline follow assessment visit . Months 3 6 approximately 1 hour Body measurement ( height , weight waist circumference ) , body fat percent , gait speed , questionnaire , accelerometry .
